Module it.polimi.ingsw.GC24
Package view.screens

Class MenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.screens.Screen
      • view.screens.MenuScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameObserver, TurnObserver, MessageTarget, Observer, View
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIMenuScreen, GUIMenu
    public abstract class MenuScreen
extends Screen
    This screen should display the menu of the game From this screen it's possible to:

    - Starting a new game, going to the ConnectionScreen

    - See the CreditsScreen

    - Quit
